Title: The industry of the motherland develops by leaps and bounds and frightens England so that it trembles with fear
Designer: Li Pingfan (李平凡)Qin Lingyun (秦岭云)Ping Ye (平野)
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: Steel production has to double or triple in just a few years, so that China can surpass England in fifteen years.
